org.ruleant.ariadne
Class AriadneLocation

java.lang.Object
  android.location.Location
      org.ruleant.ariadne.AriadneLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class AriadneLocation
extends android.location.Location

Custom Ariadne Location object, it inherits from Location class, but overrides the getString() method.

Author:
Dieter Adriaenssens
